title: Software Packing
descrption: Software packing is a method of compressing or encrypting an executable. Packing an executable changes the file signature in an attempt to avoid signature-based detection. Most decompression techniques decompress the executable code in memory.Utilities used to perform software packing are called packers. Example packers are MPRESS and UPX. A more comprehensive list of known packers is available,  but adversaries may create their own packing techniques that do not leave the same artifacts as well-known packers to evade defenses.Adversaries may use virtual machine software protection as a form of software packing to protect their code. Virtual machine software protection translates an executable's original code into a special format that only a special virtual machine can run. A virtual machine is then called to run this code.

related.Name: APT29
related.Description: APT29 used UPX to pack files.[26]

related.Name: APT3
related.Description: APT3 has been known to pack their tools.[28]

related.Name: APT38
related.Description: APT38 has used several code packing methods such as Themida, Enigma, VMProtect, and Obsidium, to pack their implants.[29]

related.Name: APT39
related.Description: APT39 has repacked a modified version of Mimikatz to thwart anti-virus detection.[33]

related.Name: Astaroth
related.Description: Astaroth uses a software packer called Pe123\RPolyCryptor.[18]

related.Name: China Chopper
related.Description: China Chopper's client component is packed with UPX.[21]

related.Name: Dark Caracal
related.Description: Dark Caracal has used UPX to pack Bandook.[30]

related.Name: DarkComet
related.Description: DarkComet has the option to compress its payload using UPX or MPRESS.[16]

related.Name: Daserf
related.Description: A version of Daserf uses the MPRESS packer.[5]

related.Name: Elderwood
related.Description: Elderwood has packed malware payloads before delivery to victims.[25]

related.Name: Emotet
related.Description: Emotet has used custom packers to protect its payloads.[17]

related.Name: FinFisher
related.Description: A FinFisher variant uses a custom packer.[14][15]

related.Name: GreyEnergy
related.Description: GreyEnergy is packed for obfuscation.[11]

related.Name: Group5
related.Description: Group5 packed an executable by base64 encoding the PE file and breaking it up into numerous lines.[31]

related.Name: H1N1
related.Description: H1N1 uses a custom packing algorithm.[3]

related.Name: jRAT
related.Description: jRAT payloads have been packed.[22]

related.Name: Machete
related.Description: Machete has been packed with NSIS. [24]

related.Name: Night Dragon
related.Description: Night Dragon is known to use software packing in its tools.[32]

related.Name: OopsIE
related.Description: OopsIE uses the SmartAssembly obfuscator to pack an embedded .Net Framework assembly used for C2.[7]

related.Name: OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D
related.Description: OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D has a variant that is packed with UPX.[23]

related.Name: Patchwork
related.Description: A Patchwork payload was packed with UPX.[27]

related.Name: SeaDuke
related.Description: SeaDuke has been packed with the UPX packer.[6]

related.Name: Soft Cell
related.Description: Soft Cell packed some payloads using different types of packers, both known and custom.[35]

related.Name: The White Company
related.Description: The White Company has obfuscated their payloads through packing.[34]

related.Name: TrickBot
related.Description: TrickBot leverages a custom packer to obfuscate its functionality.[8]

related.Name: Trojan.Karagany
related.Description: Trojan.Karagany samples sometimes use common binary packers such as UPX and Aspack on top of a custom Delphi binary packer.[10]

related.Name: Uroburos
related.Description: Uroburos uses a custom packer.[13]

related.Name: VERMIN
related.Description: VERMIN is initially packed.[4]

related.Name: yty
related.Description: yty packs a plugin with UPX.[9]

related.Name: Zebrocy
related.Description: Zebrocy's Delphi variant was packed with UPX.[19][20]

related.Name: ZeroT
related.Description: Some ZeroT DLL files have been packed with UPX.[12]
Employ heuristic-based malware detection. Ensure updated virus definitions and create custom signatures for observed malware.
